pr_title: KOGITO-1473 - Import DMN test scenario runner in KOGITO

timeline.bodyText:
I think we should not make another copy. We have already one in drools-core, be exact org.drools.core.util.XStreamUtils.
One more reason, most copied methods are deprecated, some also with linked CVE. I think we need to start think of some utils module used both by kogito and non kogito world..
timeline.author: jomarko

replies.bodyText:
The reason why I copied it instead of use the already existing copy of XStreamUtils is because of the different package: it is used by ScenarioSimulationXMLPersistence (that is in drools repo). I plan in another ticket to update ScenarioSimulationXMLPersistence to abstract over XStream instance and try to get rid of this clone but it takes time because I need to wait for a community release of 7 and then I can use it here.
Btw I have removed all the methods I'm not using.
replies.author: danielezonca

timeline.bodyText: If we won't introduce general module, we should update year

replies.bodyText:
Short answer: it is the same :)
Long answer: I usually prefer to use FQN for "autogenerated" classes. I plan to create with another ticket a Maven goal to autogenerate it in the project.
replies.author: danielezonca

timeline.bodyText:
Could we add some comment here?
For example:
/**

KogitoJunitActivator is a custom extension of JUnit's
which provides functionality of the Drools Scenario Simulation
to standard JUnit tests by means of the
Dmn context and associated support classes and annotations.
*/
timeline.author: dupliaka
